text:
Just a prediction, but I'm willing to bet at least one of the following will be true:
#2010 will be from Xenoblade Chronicles,
#2014 will be from Donkey Kong Country: Tropical Freeze, or
#2015 will be from Splatoon.

author: Jordan Oliver

text: After Braid, this was one of the first indie games that really made me notice its general quality and awesome soundtrack. Shatter had one of, if not my favorite soundtrack of 2009. I can only scratch my head as to why we haven't heard more from Module since then, I really thought this would mark the start of many more soundtracks from him. Funnily enough, Homelands might be my favorite theme in this game and it's one of the least popular.
author: SupraDarky

text:
Homelands, the best ringtone I ever had.

I need to get the entire soundtrack, I love all of these uploads. And this is an excellent example of a game and soundtrack I'd never hear of if it wasn't for this channel. So thank you for making me discover gems like this :)
author: CinnamonThief

text: Module went on (or back) to composing non-VG music. His bandcamp page is full of the stuff: https://module.bandcamp.com/
author: Vincent van der Vliet
